name: Faith Hope Charitees Logo - Organic Cotton
description:
The Faith Hope Charitees logo, featuring the flaming dove.

(Matthew 3:16 & Luke 3:16)

This is a Christian themed tee shirt that is cool enough to wear anywhere. Our graphic logo is both young and modern.

A District Threads Junior Fit Shirt:

100% organic ringspun 4.3 ounce cotton. Eco-friendly lived-in softness and a flattering, feminine fit. Nice and long in the torso, unlike some other fitted women's tees.

For a more relaxed fit, choose a size larger than you would normally wear. Consult sizing chart for more specific fit information.

View Size Chart

*Please note that actual product may differ slightly from product images due to discrepancies in monitor settings and the nature of the screen-printing process.

name: ORGANIC Fisher of Men: Funny Christian Tee Shirt
description:
When Jesus said, "become fishers of men," this is not what He had in mind. Oh well, it's the thought that counts!

(Matthew 4:19)

This funny Christian shirt would make the perfect gift for your boy-crazy best friend, or a cute tee for yourself. It's sure to get a smile out of anyone who sees it!

A District Threads Junior Fit Shirt:

100% organic ringspun 4.3 ounce cotton. Eco-friendly lived-in softness and a flattering, feminine fit. Nice and long in the torso, unlike some other fitted women's tees.

For a more relaxed fit, choose a size larger than you would normally wear. Consult sizing chart for more specific fit information.

name: Eternal Life - American Apparel Raglan Baseball Shirt - Women's Colors
description:
Eternal Life: The Best Retirement Plan

Don't wait until it's too late. Is your "retirement plan" in order?

This Christian baseball tee will turn heads and looks great on any body type. Let everyone know that you're on God's team.

An American Apparel Junior Fit Shirt:

This ladies' version of our baseball shirt is 100% baby rib cotton. This is a form-fitting body-flattering raglan shirt with 3/4 length colorblock sleeves.

This brand tends to run small and will also shrink about 1 size after washing to the size indicated on the sizing chart. We recommend buying at lease one size larger than you might normally wear. (The fit should be a little roomy before you wash it.) For an even more relaxed fit, choose 2 sizes larger than normal or choose one of the men's baseball shirts instead, for the "boyfriend fit."

Please make sure to consult the sizing chart before choosing your size.

View Size Chart

*Please note that actual product may differ slightly from product images due to discrepancies in monitor settings and the nature of the screen-printing process.
